introduction: With a range of built-in and extensible Modes, Echo AI lets you plan, architect, code, debug and boost your productivity like never before.
notice: To get started, this extension needs an API provider.

echo.description: The best free models to get started

chooseProvider: To get started, you need an LLM provider:

providerSignup.rooCloudDescription: The simplest way to use Echo. A curated mix of free and paid models at a low cost
providerSignup.useAnotherProviderDescription: Enter an API key and get going.

startRouter: We recommend using an LLM Router:
startCustom: Or you can bring your provider API key:

telemetry.helpImproveMessage: Echo AI collects error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. This telemetry does not collect code, prompts or personal information. You can turn this off in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>.
